name: Rhubarb Roastery
description:
Welcome to Rhubarb Roastery ☕

In this cozy, character-driven mobile game, you become the owner of Rhubarb Roastery, a mysterious café that appears only in times of need– drawn to groups of people at emotional crossroads in their lives. Learn about your customer’s troubles and offer them guidance through hand-crafted drinks magically infused with emotion. 

(We are currently only optimized to support iPhoneX & newer aspect ratios 😁)
